import{vehicleService as supabaseVehicleService,statisticsService}from'./supabaseService';import{supabase}from'../supabase/config';// Cache simple en memoria
let vehicleCache=null;let cacheTime=null;const CACHE_DURATION=30000;// 30 segundos
// FunciÃ³n para limpiar cache
export const clearVehicleCache=()=>{vehicleCache=null;cacheTime=null;console.log('ðŸ§¹ Cache de vehÃ­culos limpiado');};// Obtener todos los vehÃ­culos
export const getVehicles=async function(){let filters=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};try{console.log('ðŸŒ getVehicles: Iniciando consulta...');// Consulta directa simplificada
const{data,error}=await supabase.from('vehicles').select('*').order('created_at',{ascending:false});if(error){console.error('âŒ Error de Supabase:',error);// Si es error de tabla no existe, devolver array vacÃ­o
if(error.message.includes('relation "vehicles" does not exist')){console.log('ðŸ“ Tabla "vehicles" no existe, devolviendo array vacÃ­o');return[];}throw error;}console.log('âœ… Datos obtenidos de Supabase:',(data===null||data===void 0?void 0:data.length)||0);console.log('ðŸ“‹ Datos:',data);return data||[];}catch(error){console.error('âŒ Error obteniendo vehÃ­culos:',error);// En lugar de lanzar error, devolver array vacÃ­o para que la app funcione
return[];}};// Obtener un vehÃ­culo por ID
export const getVehicleById=async id=>{try{return await supabaseVehicleService.getVehicleById(id);}catch(error){console.error('Error obteniendo vehÃ­culo:',error);throw error;}};// Crear nuevo vehÃ­culo
export const createVehicle=async vehicleData=>{try{return await supabaseVehicleService.createVehicle(vehicleData);}catch(error){console.error('Error creando vehÃ­culo:',error);throw error;}};// Actualizar vehÃ­culo
export const updateVehicle=async(id,vehicleData)=>{try{return await supabaseVehicleService.updateVehicle(id,vehicleData);}catch(error){console.error('Error actualizando vehÃ­culo:',error);throw error;}};// Eliminar vehÃ­culo
export const deleteVehicle=async id=>{try{return await supabaseVehicleService.deleteVehicle(id);}catch(error){console.error('Error eliminando vehÃ­culo:',error);throw error;}};// Obtener vehÃ­culos destacados
export const getFeaturedVehicles=async function(){let limit=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:6;try{return await supabaseVehicleService.getFeaturedVehicles(limit);}catch(error){console.error('Error obteniendo vehÃ­culos destacados:',error);throw error;}};// Obtener vehÃ­culos en promociÃ³n
export const getPromotionVehicles=async function(){let limit=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:6;try{return await supabaseVehicleService.getPromotionVehicles(limit);}catch(error){console.error('Error obteniendo vehÃ­culos en promociÃ³n:',error);throw error;}};// Obtener vehÃ­culos similares
export const getSimilarVehicles=async function(currentVehicle){let limit=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:4;try{return await supabaseVehicleService.getSimilarVehicles(currentVehicle,limit);}catch(error){console.error('Error obteniendo vehÃ­culos similares:',error);throw error;}};// Obtener estadÃ­sticas de vehÃ­culos
export const getVehicleStats=async()=>{try{return await statisticsService.getStatistics();}catch(error){console.error('Error obteniendo estadÃ­sticas:',error);throw error;}};// FunciÃ³n helper para subir imÃ¡genes a Supabase
export const uploadImage=async(file,vehicleId,imageIndex)=>{try{return await supabaseVehicleService.uploadVehicleImage(file,vehicleId,imageIndex);}catch(error){console.error('Error subiendo imagen:',error);throw error;}};// FunciÃ³n helper para eliminar imÃ¡genes
export const deleteImage=async imageUrl=>{// Extraer path de la URL de Supabase
const path=imageUrl.split('/storage/v1/object/public/vehicle-images/')[1];if(path){const{deleteVehicleImage}=await import('../supabase/config');return await deleteVehicleImage(path);}};
